Posted By: Cy
Marty,

I have tried several times to get your mailing address to pay for five t206 cards that I won from you on ebay.

You have set up a non-paying item through ebay for these items but I cannot pay (I don't have PayPal) unless I have your mailing address.

Please send your mailing address and I will send out the payment as soon as possible.

My E-mail address is:   cyrilp@visuallink.com

Would you also send your phone number? I am interested in a large group of your PSA 5 T206 cards that you listed on the B/S/T board and would like to discuss the details with you.

If you want to leave your mailing address on this link, I will check here as well and get the payment out as soon as possible.

Sincerely,

Cy
